job.title: Senior Java Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtResponsibilitiesltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtThe Developer is responsible for the analysis design construction testing and implementation of business and technical information technology solutions through application of appropriate software development life cycle methodologyltligtltligtAbility to execute POC and Delivery independentlyltligtltligtAgile project experienceltligtltligtConstructs tests and implements portions of business and technical information technology solutions through application of appropriate software development life cycle methodologyltligtltligtParticipates in standard business and technical information technology solution implementations upgrades enhancements and conversionsltligtltligtUses appropriate tools to analyze identify and resolve business and or technical problemsltligtltligtInteracts with the customer to gain an understanding of the business environment and technical contextltligtltligtValidates scope plans and deliverables for assigned projectsltligtltligtLeads the design development implementation and support of information technology solutions encompassing multiple specializations platforms and technologiesltligtltligtResearches analyzes recommends and implements new technologies standard processes tools and techniquesltligtltligtAssists in defining alternate solutions for the business problem ltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgt
